languages.text:
Allows you to set the difficulty of space combat. This setting affects the performance of enemy voidships and your ability to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.

Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is reduced by −40%.

Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is increased by +20%.
languages.translation_comment: power of enemy evasion abilities is mentioned once only - GD confirms that it is OK
languages.original_text:
Позволяет установить сложность космических боев. Влияет на эффективность вражеских пустотных кораблей и возможности для ремонта флагмана Вольного Торговца.

Легкий уровень сложности позволяет без труда завершать сражения: -Урон, наносимый врагами, уменьшен на 90%. -Стоимость ремонта флагмана уменьшена на 95%. -Показатели некоторых способностей уклонения противников снижены на 75%. -Максимальная целостность корпуса вражеских пустотных кораблей уменьшена на 40%.

Нормальный уровень сложности позволяет завершать большинство боев без существенных усилий: -Урон, наносимый врагами, уменьшен на 40%. -Стоимость ремонта уменьшена на 20%. -Вражеские пустотные корабли обладают базовым значением максимальной целостности корпуса.

Бесстрашный уровень сложности предлагает игроку испытать полноценный опыт пустотных сражений: -Враги наносят полный урон. -Для ремонта необходимо базовое количество металлолома. -Вражеские пустотные корабли обладают базовым значением максимальной целостности корпуса.

Сложный уровень сложности представляет собой дополнительное испытание для опытных игроков: -Урон, наносимый врагами, увеличен на 25%. -Для ремонта необходимо базовое количество металлолома. -Максимальная целостность корпуса вражеских пустотных кораблей увеличена на 20%.

Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is reduced by −40%.

Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is increased by +20%.

Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

languages.text:
Ermöglicht dir, die Schwierigkeit von Raumkämpfen zu bestimmen. Diese Einstellung beeinflusst die Leistung feindlicher Raumschiffe und deine Fähigkeit, das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu reparieren.

Leicht stellt dich in Kämpfen vor eine nachgerade lächerliche Herausforderung: -Gegner verursachen −90 % Schaden. -Reparaturkosten sind um −95 % reduziert. -Die Effizienz einiger Ausweichen-Fähigkeiten von Gegnern ist um −75 % reduziert. -Die maximale Rumpfintegrität feindlicher Raumschiffe ist um −40 % reduziert.

Normal bietet in den meisten Kämpfen ein entspanntes Spielerlebnis: -Gegner verursachen −40 % Schaden. -Reparaturkosten sind um −20 % reduziert. -Feindliche Raumschiffe haben eine Basis-Rumpfintegrität.

Waghalsig bietet dir das volle Raumkampf-Erlebnis: -Gegner verursachen vollen Schaden. -Die Reparatur des Flaggschiffs kostet einen Basisbetrag an Schrott. -Feindliche Raumschiffe haben einen Basisbetrag maximaler Rumpfintegrität.

Schwer ist ein Schwierigkeitsgrad, der erfahrene Spieler vor eine zusätzliche Herausforderung stellt: -Gegner verursachen +25 % Schaden. -Die Reparatur des Flaggschiffs kostet einen Basisbetrag an Schrott. -Maximale Rumpfintegrität feindlicher Raumschiffe erhöht sich um +20 %.

Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is reduced by −40%.

languages.text:
Permet de définir la difficulté des combats spatiaux. Ce paramètre affecte les performances des bâtiments adverses et votre capacité à réparer le vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

Le niveau de difficulté Facile fait du combat une simple formalité : -Les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont réduits de 90 %. -Le coût des réparations est réduit de 95 %. -La puissance des capacités d'évitement de certains ennemis est réduite de 75 %. -L'intégrité maximum de la coque des vaisseaux adverses est réduite de 40 %.

Le niveau de difficulté Normal offre dans la plupart des cas des combats relativement fluides : -Les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont réduits de 40 %. -Le coût des réparations est réduit de 20 %. -La coque des vaisseaux ennemis bénéficie d'une intégrité maximum de base.

Le niveau de difficulté Téméraire offre l'expérience la plus complète en termes de combats spatiaux : -Les ennemis infligent l'intégralité de leurs dégâts. -Le nombre de pièces nécessaires pour réparer le vaisseau amiral n'est pas modifié. -La coque des vaisseaux ennemis bénéficie d'une intégrité maximum de base.

Destiné aux joueurs expérimentés, le niveau de difficulté Difficile ajoute des défis supplémentaires aux combats : -Les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont augmentés de 25 %. -Le nombre de pièces nécessaires pour réparer le vaisseau amiral n'est pas modifié. -L'intégrité maximum de la coque des vaisseaux adverses est augmentée de 20 %.

languages.text:
您可以在此设置太空战斗的难度，难度会影响敌方虚空舰造成的伤害，以及修复行商浪人旗舰的能力。

简单难度下的战斗难度几乎不值一提： - 敌方造成的所有伤害降低90%。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量降低95%。 - 部分敌人的闪避能力降低75%。 - 敌方虚空舰的最大舰体完整度降低40%。

普通难度在绝大多数情况下，都会提供比较安逸的战斗体验： - 敌方造成的所有伤害降低40%。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量降低20%。 - 敌方虚空舰的最大舰体完整度为正常数额。

冒险难度会提供完整的太空战斗体验： - 敌方造成的伤害为全额伤害。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量为正常数量。 - 敌方虚空舰的最大舰体完整度为正常数额。

困难难度会为经验丰富的玩家提供额外的挑战： - 敌方造成的所有伤害提高25%。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量为正常数量。 - 敌方虚空舰的最大舰体完整度提高20%。

languages.text:
Te permite establecer la dificultad de los combates espaciales. Esta opción afecta al rendimiento de las naves enemigas y a tu capacidad de reparar la nave insignia de tu Comerciante Independiente.

La dificultad Fácil supone un desafío trivial: -El daño de enemigos se reduce un −90 %. -El coste de reparación se reduce un −95 %. -La potencia de algunas capacidades de esquiva enemigas se reduce un −75 %. -La integridad de casco máxima de las naves enemigas se reduce un −40 %.

La dificultad Normal proporciona una experiencia tranquila en la mayoría de combates: -El daño de enemigos se reduce un −40 %. -El coste de reparación se reduce un −20 %. -Las naves enemigas tienen la cantidad base de integridad de casco máxima.
La dificultad
Audaz proporciona la experiencia completa de combate en el vacío: -Los enemigos infligen daño completo. -La reparación de la nave insignia requiere la cantidad base de chatarra. -Las naves enemigas tienen la cantidad base de integridad de casco máxima.

La dificultad Difícil proporciona un desafío adicional para jugadores experimentados: -El daño de enemigos aumenta un +25 %. -La reparación de la nave insignia requiere la cantidad base de chatarra. -La integridad de casco máxima de las naves enemigas aumenta un +20 %.
languages.original_text:
Allows you to set the difficulty of space combat. This setting affects the performance of enemy voidships and your ability to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.

Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is reduced by −40%.

Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is increased by +20%.

traits.locale_text:
Te permite establecer la dificultad de los combates espaciales. Esta opción afecta al rendimiento de las naves enemigas y a tu capacidad de reparar la nave insignia de tu Comerciante Independiente.

La dificultad Fácil supone un desafío trivial: -El daño de enemigos se reduce un −90 %. -El coste de reparación se reduce un −95 %. -La potencia de algunas capacidades de esquiva enemigas se reduce un −75 %. -La integridad de casco máxima de las naves enemigas se reduce un −40 %.

La dificultad Normal proporciona una experiencia tranquila en la mayoría de combates: -El daño de enemigos se reduce un −40 %. -El coste de reparación se reduce un −20 %. -Las naves enemigas tienen la cantidad base de integridad de casco máxima.
La dificultad
Audaz proporciona la experiencia completa de combate en el vacío: -Los enemigos infligen daño completo. -La reparación de la nave insignia requiere la cantidad base de chatarra. -Las naves enemigas tienen la cantidad base de integridad de casco máxima.

La dificultad Difícil proporciona un desafío adicional para jugadores experimentados: -El daño de enemigos aumenta un +25 %. -La reparación de la nave insignia requiere la cantidad base de chatarra. -La integridad de casco máxima de las naves enemigas aumenta un +20 %.

languages.text:
ここでは、宇宙での戦闘難易度を設定することができます。この設定は、敵のヴォイドシップのパフォーマンス、あなたの自由開拓者の旗艦の修理アビリティに影響します。

イージーの難易度では、戦闘における挑戦はほんの少しだけになります。 ・敵の与ダメージを-90％減少。 ・修理コストを-95％減少。 ・一部の敵の回避能力が−75％減少。 ・敵のヴォイドシップの船体の完全性が−40％減少。

ノーマルの難易度では、だいたいの戦闘で焦らずプレイできます。 ・敵の与ダメージを-40％減少。 ・修理コストを-20％減少。 ・敵のヴォイドシップが船体の完全性の基本最大量を持つ。

「フィアレス」の難易度では、ヴォイドでの戦闘を全て体験できます。 ・敵の与ダメージが完全ダメージになる。 ・旗艦の修理コストは基本のスクラップ数が必要だ。 ・敵のヴォイドシップが船体の完全性の基本最大値を持つ。

ハードでは、経験豊富なプレイヤーにさらなる挑戦を与えます。 ・敵の与ダメージが+25％増加。 ・旗艦の修理コストは基本のスクラップ数が必要だ。 ・敵のヴォイドシップの船体の完全性の最大値が+20％増加。
languages.original_text:
Allows you to set the difficulty of space combat. This setting affects the performance of enemy voidships and your ability to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.

Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is reduced by −40%.

Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is increased by +20%.

languages.text:
Uzay çatışmalarının zorluğunu ayarlayabilmeni sağlar. Bu ayar, düşman uçsuz gemilerinin performansını ve Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisini onarabilme kabiliyetini etkiler.

Kolay zorluğu, çatışmaları zorlanmadan tamamlamanı sağlar: -Düşmanların verdiği hasar %90 azalır. -Onarım bedeli %95 azalır. -Bazı düşman kaçınma kabiliyetlerinin gücü %75 azalır. -Düşman uçsuz gemilerinin maksimum gövde bütünlüğü %40 azalır.

Normal zorluğu, çoğu çatışmayı önemli bir çaba harcamadan geçmeni sağlar: -Düşmanların verdiği hasar %40 azalır. -Onarım bedeli %20 azalır. -Düşman uçsuz gemileri, taban miktarda maksimum gövde bütünlüğüne sahiptir.

Yürekli zorluğu, tam bir uçsuz çatışması deneyimi sunar: -Düşmanlar tam hasar verir. -Sancak gemisi onarımı, taban miktarda hurda gerektirir. -Düşman uçsuz gemileri, taban miktarda maksimum gövde bütünlüğüne sahiptir.

Zor zorluğu, deneyimli oyuncular için ekstra mücadele sunar: -Düşmanların verdiği hasar %25 artar. -Sancak gemisi onarımı, taban miktarda hurda gerektirir. -Düşman uçsuz gemilerinin maksimum gövde bütünlüğü %20 artar.
languages.original_text:

Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is reduced by −40%.

Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Enemy voidships have a base amount of maximum hull integrity.

Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Flagship repair requires a base amount of scrap. -Maximum hull integrity of enemy voidships is increased by +20%.
